title: Clarification of E-Mail
body: So I woke up this morning to an e-mail from accounts@riotgames.com with information about a password change request. Needless to say I didn't do anything of the sort. I haven't clicked the link in the e-mail either due to being so unsure if it is a legit email from Riot or not. If this is the wrong section I am sorry.

replies.body: That's weird!  I looked into this for you and don't see that it's something we submitted.  This would be a good time to run through the account protection guide to secure your info inside and out of league, in case an unauthorized user tried to gain access to your account.  I suggest resetting your password for both your email and account.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ip7bnRrY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-19T16:39:09.364+0000)
>
> That's weird!  I looked into this for you and don't see that it's something we submitted.  This would be a good time to run through the account protection guide to secure your info inside and out of league, in case an unauthorized user tried to gain access to your account.  I suggest resetting your password for both your email and account.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Sorry, I suppose it would have made more sense to post from the account in question. I was just somewhat afraid to do so currently. The account is pandaskinben . I sent in a support ticket, but I was just more curious if that email was legit before I went through the process of changing everything. No point in using the link if it takes me to somewhere bogus. Thank you!

Thanks!  Everything looks okay to me, but I recommend [updating your security settings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) anyway, it's always better to be safe!
